description: **Tool Overview**: This tool facilitates checking the current version of the Microsoft Edge browser, which is essential for ensuring that the browser is updated to mitigate vulnerabilities such as CVE-2024-8639. **Details**: To check the version of Microsoft Edge, you can navigate to the 'About' section typically found in the menu of the browser. This area not only displays the current version but also prompts Edge to check for updates. Keeping your browser updated is crucial because vulnerabilities in the underlying Chromium engine could affect performance and security. Regularly checking and updating Microsoft Edge can prevent software exploits that compromise user data or system integrity.
